projects.overview: In this little app you could administrate your TODOs, create TODOs, edit them and delete them. This App was created using React JS, vanilla CSS and implementing webpack manually.
features: React projects configured using webpack and babel manually

projects.overview: It's a single page application that was created using React, React-Redux, Redux Thunk to make asynchronous requests to The Movie Database API.
features: Created using React, React router dom y Redux.
Eslint is used as a linter

projects.overview: Its a web page was created using HTML, CSS and vanilla JS for the frontend and node js for the little backend. This web app fetch data from twitter API to create a graph. Also, you can select nodes to calculate the shortest route using dijkstra algorithm.
features: Webpack was used to minified the frontend
CytoscapeJS to draw the nodes and edges
Express was used to create a little server
The backend perfom the fetch to twitter API
A little documentation was created using JSdocs

projects.overview: This landing page shows data of Rick and Morty API, it was created using HTML, CSS and JS.
features: Asynchronous calls to Rick and Morty API
